game.title: The Lost Temple
game.objective: Retrieve the ancient relic from the lost temple.
game.description: The temple is hidden deep in the jungle, and you need to navigate through treacherous paths and avoid deadly traps to reach the treasure chamber.
game.reward: 100 gold coins and a magical amulet

task.objective: Find the entrance to the lost temple
task.description: The entrance is hidden behind a waterfall. Look for a small cave behind the falling water.

task.objective: Navigate through the deadly traps in the temple
task.description: The traps are triggered by pressure plates and laser beams. Use your wits to disable them without getting caught.

task.objective: Retrieve the ancient relic from the treasure chamber
task.description: The relic is inside a pedestal surrounded by laser beams. Use your magic to disable the beams and retrieve the relic.
